text: Musrikaharule bhane ki allahale caheko bha'e hamile ra hamra babubajele usabaheka aru kasaiko puja garne thi'enan ra nata hamile usako adesa bina kunai kurala'i harama (varjita) thahara'umthyaum. (He paigambara!) Yastai prakarale yiniharubhanda agadika manisaharule pani gareka thi'e, tasartha paigambaraharuko jim'mama matra spastarupale sandesa purya'idinu baheka aru kehi cha
